why we are folding instead of stirring I
mean gently folding it is because we
want to keep the air into the mixture if
we just stir it simply then we are going
to lose all the air and the souffle is
not going to rise up
I reckon the mixture is ready but before

is because we want to create some tiny

let's fill those ramekins so as you can
